A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: scenes that were brilliant lead to no consequences or change. The major points in the plot was to distinguish the efforts of all in previous films as failures beyond measure\, it ripped the spiritual heart of star wars and laid it on a pyre\, watching it as it burns\, Mark Hamill's Luke Skywalker deserved more\, George Lucas' brought myth making to the forefront of a generation\, and the prime lesson of the last jedi was...kill the past(which is the path to the dark side). as a side note no matter who you may think the jedi were\, they would never advocate book burning.
